column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We were so impressed from our last visit to Lou Malnati's (state st location) that we came to this location to get more pizza a couple days later! No wait at 4pm on a Saturday
column2: which was great. The restaurant is unique and charming. Before we got the pizza
column3: we got the cheese bread. It's a little pricey (I believe $7.95?) but it was a little garlicky
column4: and a good appetizer since the pizza takes 30-60 minutes to cook
column5: and depending on how busy the restaurant is. It comes with a delicious tomato sauce that has really fresh flavors and balances out the cheese & bread combo. I'd recommend the bread for sure.
